DefaultEvent.Description: $Pigmote Isle -> ピグモート・アイル$A word in the right furry ear. A little distraction. Pigmote Isle will have to do without some of its workers. At least, without the ones who can afford passage aboard your ship.
DefaultEvent.Name: All aboard!

ChildBranches.Name: An opportunity beckons
ChildBranches.Description: If they are desperate to leave, they will pay for passage.

SuccessEvent.Description: $Pigmote Isle -> ピグモート・アイル$Diplomacy works. The emigrants are taken aback by the arrival of soft words and outstretched paws, and the promise of forgiveness. A few still risk the zee and its many dangers, but most accept [q:Pigmote Isle: Mastery]'s offered amnesty and return.
SuccessEvent.Name: A rousing speech

DefaultEvent.Description: $Pigmote Isle -> ピグモート・アイル$The traitors do not listen. [q:Pigmote Isle: Mastery] lacks the force of arms to stop them leaving. They put to zee in their hastily made boats and rafts, and disappear into the darkness.
DefaultEvent.Name: Failed diplomacy

ChildBranches.Name: Suggest appealing to their patriotism
ChildBranches.Description: Remind them why they came here, and what they can still become.

SuccessEvent.Description: The traitors surrender. Their leaders are punished harshly as a lesson to the others. The rest are returned to work, yoked to their tools until they can be trusted again.
SuccessEvent.Name: Order is restored

DefaultEvent.Description: The resistance is too fierce, too desperate. A few rodents sacrifice their freedom to hold the line. Sad squeaks salute their bravery as the escaping rafts and boats slowly disappear into the darkness.
DefaultEvent.Name: A disastrous rout

ChildBranches.Name: Recommend a display of force
ChildBranches.Description: Have them escorted back to town at swordpoint.

Description: "The lights of London call to our people, Hairless Adviser. They seek the warmth of its lamps. The abundance of food." The aide leans in. "Already the traitors repurpose the Impossible Lamb's hull into rafts and boats for their shameful and terrible exodus! We cannot survive if our people desert us. What should we do?"
Name: $Pigmote Isle -> ピグモート・アイル$A Dilemma On Pigmote Isle
